title: Premiere: Outsider – Bent Glasses
body:
##### Photo: Tonje Thilesen Two years on from his debut, a hugely underrated seven track release entitled [Puma Punk](http://admin.

crackintheroad.com/music/13766-introducing-outside/), NY’s **Outsider** has returned with new track, _Bent Glasses_, lifted from his forthcoming sophomore release, **_The Last Guardian_**. Showing a maturity to his songwriting, the underlying sensibilities which personally made Puma Punk so enticing, are still there to be heard, yet merging his 80’s indebted sound with the likes of Washed Out and Neon Indian. The production is cleaner, the ambition is perhaps bolder, and ultimately, it’s an extremely promising step forward for Outside. _Bent Glasses_ is taken from The Last Guardian, out later in the year, an album taking it’s name from forever delayed Japanese video game. Check it out below.
